about_the_game:
Neden is a virtual world inspired by the real one, with elements of Sci-Fi and magic.

A place to socialize, explore and do whatever you can do in the real world and much more.

Build your own world

Build your own private space with items acquired in other game modes. Whether your style is a Viking cabin or a mansion with a pool. You can build together with other users in your own private space, you choose who you want to share your world with.

New friends

Enter non-game maps, where you can relax and talk with people from all over the world while discovering new friends.

You can create ads to show to other players!

Many game modes

Whether you prefer to fight or go in search of new items, try out one of these game modes:

Survival
Face a lot of monsters equipped with random weapons in this fun mode. Some enemies will be very strong and you will not be able to face them alone: ​​work together with other players and ensure victory.
Not all players will be your friends, the PvP mode allows you to attack, defeat and steal materials from your opponents!

Deathmatch
1v1 or team maches, choose your favorite weapons set and start the match. Be the first to reach the target before the time limit ends and wipe out your opponents!

Share yourself

Create your own character and customize it however you like. Let your personality shine through your avatar, your world and your actions.

Upcoming modes:

  • Car racing, where you can race with various vehicles on many different circuits.

  • In Go-up mode you have to reach the highest point of the map in the shortest time possible, you can try solo mode or with other players to see who gets there first trying to obstruct each other.

  • Completing global missions can unlock new in-game features for all players.

  • Ability to create your own custom textures for character's clothing.

content_descriptors.notes:
Because you can interact with other people in game with voice-chat or text-chat, some users may use trash talk or explicit sexual language.

Due to the game modes (survival, deathmatch, battle royal and so on) there is the possibility to kill other players and NPC with rifles and weapons.
In the social maps (non-game maps) you can not kill other users, but you can still equip some weapons.

Neden is a virtual world inspired by the real one, with elements of Sci-Fi and magic.

A place to socialize, explore and do whatever you can do in the real world and much more.

name: Neden

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7500, AMD Ryzen™ 5 3400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Playable on HDD with Mid quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-9700, AMD Ryzen™ 5 3600XT
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 24 GB available space
  • VR Support: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Playable on SSD with High quality settings.

short_description: Play in a virtual world by creating your own character in a tons of different game modes with your friends. Join a community in "New Eden".
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
